calendar.description: House Economic Development and Workforce Services Hearing
Senate Economic Development and Workforce Services Hearing

general_provisions: This bill amends provisions of the Governor's Office of Economic Opportunity.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>amends and defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>amends provisions of the Office of Homeless Services regarding certain legislative appropriations;<hr><ltbullet>amends provisions of the Governor's Office of Economic Opportunity;<hr><ltbullet>repeals the Unified Economic Opportunity Commission and associated committees and subcommittees;<hr><ltbullet>renumbers and amends the Utah Broadband Center and Access Act; <hr><ltbullet>makes technical and conforming changes; and<hr><ltbullet>provides intent language regarding the transfer of funding from the Utah Board of Higher Education - Administration fund to the Utah Board of Higher Education Nucleus Institute upon passage of this bill and H.B. 530, Utah Innovation Lab Modifications.
